name: img
label: Image
help_text: The recommended image size is 2000 pixels in width (3000 pixels for retina displays)

name: video
label: Video - *.mp4
help_text:
If a custom video (*.mp4) is configured here, it will overwrite the image.
Please make sure that the file size is not too big. A general rule of thumb is to keep reducing the file size until it starts to noticeably be degraded. Try to export videos in 720p and with a bitrate under 700kb/s ( preferably 500kb/s ).

name: youtube_link
label: Video - Youtube
help_text: Enter your Youtube Link or ID. This will overwrite the previously configured image or *.mp4-video

name: desc
label: Description
default: Description. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et

name: logo
label: Image / Logo
help_text: Logo or image shown at bottom of content

children.name: internal_url
children.label: Use Internal URL instead
children.help_text: Here anchor links or other types can be configured, e.g. tel:+49891233456

name: btn_type
label: Button Type
help_text: Choose between CTA and Button. CTA allows advanced analytics and is created using HubSpots CTA editor. Buttons do not offer any analytics but are better for performance.

children.name: section_height
children.label: Section Height (px)
children.help_text: Optional for Desktop sized screens. Otherwise scaled by content.

children.name: scheme
children.label: Color Scheme
children.help_text:
Predefined light or dark color scheme. 
Light -> Light background and dark font color.
Dark -> Dark background and light font color.
Note: You can optionally overwrite the background with further settings

children.name: cta_style
children.label: CTA Style
children.help_text: For Hubspot or custom button styles set in Hubspot, add the class pwr-cta--hubspot-style to the CTA settings under Advanced Options. This disables the CTA style configured here.

children.name: background
children.label: Background
children.help_text: Optionally overwrite the default background with a custom background-color, a background-image / -video or a gradient

children.name: background_image
children.label: Background Image / Placeholder Image (Video)
children.help_text: The image should be at least 2000 pixels in width

children.name: background_video
children.label: Background Video - *.mp4
children.help_text:
If a custom video (*.mp4) is configured here, it will overwrite the background image.
Please make sure that the file size is not too big. A general rule of thumb is to keep reducing the file size until it starts to noticeably be degraded. Try to export videos in 720p and with a bitrate under 700kb/s ( preferably 500kb/s ).

children.name: youtube_link
children.label: Background Video - Youtube
children.help_text: Enter your Youtube Link or ID. This will overwrite the previously configured background image or custom background video *.mp4

children.name: overlay_color
children.label: Overlay Color
children.help_text: Set the opacity to 0% if you do not want to use an overlay

children.name: overlay_gradient_direction
children.label: Overlay Gradient Direction
choices: Diagonal - Top Left to Right Bottom
Diagonal - Bottom Left to Top Right

children.name: overlay_gradient_color_1
children.label: Overlay Gradient Color 1
children.help_text:
Opacity setting only works in modern versions of Chrome, Safari and Opera. 
Alternatively you can configure the general opacity for the whole gradient overlay

children.name: overlay_gradient_color_2
children.label: Overlay Gradient Color 2
children.help_text:
Opacity setting only works in modern versions of Chrome, Safari and Opera. 
Alternatively you can configure the general opacity for the whole gradient overlay

children.name: overlay_gradient_opacity
children.label: Overlay Gradient Opacity in %
children.help_text: General opacity for the gradient overlay. Overwrites individual opacity settings of the gradient colors, if not 100% -> General opacity for the gradient overlay. Overwrites individual opacity settings of the gradient colors

children.name: background_gradient_direction
children.label: Background Gradient Direction
choices: Diagonal - Top Left to Right Bottom
Diagonal - Bottom Left to Top Right

name: animation
label: Animation
inline_help_text: Please open preview in a new tab/window to preview the animations.

children.name: is_aos
children.label: Animate on Scroll?
children.help_text: Turn on/off animation on scroll for this module.

children.name: delay
children.label: Delay
children.help_text: Values from 0 to 3000, with step 50ms
children.inline_help_text: Leave blank for default value from theme settings.

name: anchor_link_id
label: Anchor Link ID
help_text: Anchor Link ID to Jump to a Specific Part of a Page https://www.yoursite.com/this-page#anchor-link-id. The ID must begin with a letter ([A-Za-z]) and may be followed by any number of letters, digits ([0-9]), hyphens ("-"), underscores ("_"), colons (":"), and periods (".")
